ProductInfo.Features:
Now you can monitor the outside of your home with infrared technology to allow you to see in low light situations.
LiveWatch Outdoor IP Bullet Camera with Infrared is easy to install, relocate and use with LiveWatch alarm monitoring.  The service component of the camera that comes with LiveWatch alarm monitoring makes the camera superior to anything you can purchase from Home Security Store, SimpliSafe or any other home security dealer.
Video can be scheduled to record based on events triggered by your home security system.
Video and surveillance cameras give you the ability to see your home or business at anytime from anywhere.
The camera works perfectly with a Simon XT or Simon XTi and can be programmed to record video when a door or window is opened or closed when the camera is connected to a home security system with award-winning LiveWatch alarm monitoring. No DVR required!
ProductInfo.Name: LiveWatch ADC-V700X Outdoor IP Bullet Camera w Infrared
